title: Bootstrap
content: I meet new people everyday and they are really nice but I'm not able to connect with them like I'm the part of a group but I feel that the friendship I made with the group is very superficial,and I'm worried am I the problem?

comments.body: It's just your first week bro, u don't need to have good relationships the first day itself... Take ur time, have fun and don't worry about this stuff.
but alot of seniors said that friend groups finish forming in bootstrap and it's harder to talk to new people once classes start?
Also someone tell me how to initiate a conversation with a girl. I'm a fucking noob in such stuff
Just speak normally I'm a girl
Just speak normally like how you would with others I'm a girl. I understand though I don't know how to initiate a convo with a guy too. I introduce myself convo ends and then it's awkward
Half of my conversations end after where are you from🤣
It's better than mine the conversations I have end at what department are you from and all of them reply cse😑
It's better than mine the conversations I have end at what department are you from and all of them reply cse😑
Mine end at what department are you from and most reply cse
I have stopped asking that ever simple the first day
Ey bub forget whoever said that . KCET guys didn't even have bootstrap last yr and still most peeps like me managed to get a decent friend grp . Chill and just get along
Relatable
So true
Not at all true. I found my best friends in class only.
literally
that's literally me.
Lol no. I have spoken to people I met in my bootstrap since my bootstrap ended. All my friends came from classroom interactions. Chill, you have 4 years to make college friends.
Welcome to engineering!!
Don't say that please 😭
Your advise worked I spoke to a lot of girls. Thanks for the advice 🛐
damn okay, thenks
Glad it did!
Dude you a legend fr 🛐🛐🛐🛐

Bro it's your first week... Take it easy haha.
I didn't find my friend group till the end of 2nd year and now we're inseparable lol
Most Bootstrap friends become hi/bye buddies after this Friday dude. Class is shared trauma and that's where real relationships are forged.
Me too fr

Yupppp
I feel the same buddy
Happy cake day!
